pizza.name: Pizza!
pizza.description: Increases <y>all stats and levels you up instantly</c>.
pizza.story: It's PIZZA time! 30 years or it's FREE! FREE I SAID YES FREE!

knockupFin.name: Knockup Fin
knockupFin.description: <y>10% chance</c> to knock enemies into the air. Afterwards, slam them into the ground for <y>50%</c> <c_stack>(+50% per stack)</c> <y>base damage, stunning.</c> nearby enemies.
knockupFin.destination:
Cage 255,
Preservation Center,
The Big Dipper
knockupFin.story:
I'm sorry, we couldn't perform a succesful surgery, big guy couldn't handle the stress. 
Here, i remember you said you loved his fins, we are sending them back to you, it's the only part that remained untouched. 
Take Care.
